basics.label: And And
basics.summary: I am a highly motivated and skilled programmer in several front and backend web technologies committed to crafting creative and maintainable solutions to problems.

references.reference: i worked with Yun for several years and during that time always found him to be a creative, humble and dedicated colleague. he is keen to learn and keen to apply his knowledge in any environment, always rising to the challenge put before him. when asked to take on large scale projects – such as the production of a series of gameplay – Yun for his deliverables., if you looking for a talented developer, as well as a great team member, than look no further. i had the pleasure of working with Yun now for over a year, and since then the quality of our code base has gone up significantly. with my eight plus year of experience Yun has separated himself from others i worked with.
